content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah Rahman, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am interested in renting it out for the highest possible price. What is your offer for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of x Euro. Can you tell me more about the apartment? How many rooms does it have? Is it furnished?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: The apartment is 25 square meters and has one room. It is not furnished. Would you like to see more pictures of the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: No, that's enough. Thank you for your time. I will consider your offer and get back to you.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: You're welcome, Ryanah. Please let me know if you have any further questions or if you would like to make an offer. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
